planet.name: HD 7449 b
planet.description: HD 7449 b was found with the European High Accuracy Radial velocity Planet Searcher (HARPS) which can reach sub-meter-per-second precision. The planetary system contains at least one other planet, HD 7449 c. The host star shows signs of short-term activity due to magnetic features on the stellar surface.
